name: Unlinked Mask
description:
Play the prequel of Linked Mask!

Incarnate yourself in the skin of Viewer, a curious traveler who has been called by the gods to fulfill an objective that is not very clear, but you're here.

A 2D platformer with a gradual difficulty but at no time taking you by the hand to overcome the different challenges.









https://store.steampowered.com/app/1111590/Linked_Mask/
